What I'm up to :)

  • positively
  • living it up at WashU \#senioryear
  • ambitiously
  • building an app with a lit team
  • and
  • adoringly pestering my friends + fam

    I’ve put off writing this blog for years. Because I've been stressing over making myself sound like I know my stuff. But I'm not perfect. I'm trialing through life, just as everybody else is. And I’m trying to embrace this by finally just doing what I’ve been wanting to do: processing and sharing my thoughts through written words, unfiltered.

    Feel free to hit me up @ fang.j.sra@gmail.com
